"In order to disable this option, you will be prompted to switch to any other default dialer.
This action is required by Google."

"In order to disable this option, you will be prompted to switch to any other default dialer.
This action is required by Google."
When disabling Custom Call Screen option your Call blocking mode will be changed to Ignore. Send to Voicemail requires to set Call Control as your Caller ID and Spam detection app.
When disabling Custom Call Screen option your Call blocking mode will be changed to Ignore. Disconnect mode is available only when Custom Call Screen is enabled.

"In order for the application to function correctly, you need to set Call Control as your default dialer.
This action is required by Google."
In order to pick up and hang up the phone, the Custom Call Screen option will be automatically enabled.
When disabling Custom Call Screen option your Call blocking mode will be changed to Voicemail. Disconnect mode is available only when Custom Call Screen is enabled.

"In order for the application to function correctly, you need to set Call Control as your default Caller ID and Spam detection app. Otherwise, call blocking capability will be limited.
This action is required by Google."

"In order for the application to function correctly, you need to set Call Control as your default dialer. Otherwise, call blocking capability will be limited.
This action is required by Google."

"In order to pick up and hang up the phone, we need access to actions that are only available when setting Call Control as a your default dialer. In addition, the Custom Call Screen option will be also automatically enabled."
In order to use voicemail mode, we need to set Call Control as your default Caller ID and Spam detection app.

"You now have the option to make Call Control your default phone application.

This action is not required for Call Control to function properly. If you'd like to skip this step, you can click \"Cancel\" in the dialog \"Set Call Control as your default phone\".

You can always change this setting later if desired, and it will not affect the functionality of your phone or other phone apps."

Please add the area or wild card masks in the international format with asterisk sign at the end, e.g. +1XXX* or +1XXXXXX*
You can block one of the numbers starting from the needed digits from your call log and then go to your Blocked List, find this number to edit it, slide the \"Block Similar Number\" slider to \"Entire Area Code\" or \"Similar\" position. It will then display the number as +1 (XXX) XXX-XXXX and should block those calls.

Enhanced Caller ID will enhance your incoming call screen providing you with detailed information about unknown callers. Your default incoming call screen is replaced with a custom Call Control version.
Use this slider to set where overlay will appear on call.

Enhanced Caller ID will appear as a small popup that only covers a part of your call screen, maintaining your default call screen while overlaying a small window of information. You can adjust the position of the incoming call popup below.
In order to display and avoid blocking your phone contacts, Call Control needs your permission to access your contacts. You can give Call Control access in Call Control’s settings.
Call Control requires permission to access and control your phone in order to block calls. You can give Call Control access in Call Control’s settings.
Call Control needs your permission to block text messages.
Call Control needs your permission to access your messages. Messaging functionality will be disabled until this permission is granted. You can give Call Control access in Call Control’s settings.

"Call Control requires permission to store and recover backups.
Please tap the “Allow Access to Storage” button below and then enable access in the system message that appears next."
Call Control needs your permission for reading and writing files in storage. You can give Call Control access in Call Control’s settings.
Text blocking is now enabled! Call Control is now your default messaging app.
Community Blocking is available with Call Control Premium only. Click OK to become a Premium now.

"Block List is full. Add unlimited numbers to your Block List and lots more with Call Control Premium. Click OK to become a Premium now."

You can make sure your subscription to Call Control Premium is activated by checking Community page from Call Control sidebar that will show Cellphone Protection: Premium.
You can also go to the About Call Control screen and your subscription status will be shown there at the top of the page.

Call Control will block a majority of Robocalls automatically, but occasionally you may get a call from an unwanted caller. If that happens it’s simple to block that caller from ever calling you again!
Simply navigate to your Recent Calls history, tap or long tap the caller you want blocked and tap Block and Report. You can optionally provide details such as the caller’s name, type of call and/or any comments about the caller which are reported to help improve the Call Control service.

"QKSMS is a full featured messaging application that was designed for seamless and simplified SMS and MMS messaging. Call Control has partnered with QKSMS to provide an improved messaging experience while still allowing you full capability to block incoming SMS and MMS messages just like you can for phone calls.
By integrating QKSMS, you can leverage our spam-blocking technology to block unwanted text messages from reaching you.
QKSMS is free, so no payment is required!"

"Scammers commonly call from a similar number, called spoofing, to trick you into answering the phone. The Block Spoofed Similar Numbers feature automatically blocks these callers. Contacts are always allowed through and won't be blocked, even if a contact number is similar to yours."

"We review EVERY support request and regularly update Call Control based on your feedback.
To get started, please provide details about the problem you’re experiencing in the space below:"
"Please explain the problem you're experiencing in detail, including the events that led up to the problem and any relevant details."
Select what you’d like to include along with your support request. The more we get the better we can address your specific issue.
Include information about my operating system and device to help troubleshoot device specific issues.
Include a log of your current options and settings you have configured in Call Control.
Include a log of your current settings for paired Call Control Home devices.
This is a support log created by Call Control specific to your issue.
Here is what will be sent to our support team. Click SEND to submit or BACK to make changes before submitting. For security reasons your data will be encrypted before sending.

Multiple digits: use * symbol to replace many digits in a phone number.
example: +1(206)425–5*

Single digit: use ? symbol to replace any digit in a phone number.
example: +1(206) ???-5555
